com.buschmais.jqassistant.core.scanner.api

Interface ScannerPlugin<I,D extends com.buschmais.jqassistant.core.store.api.model.Descriptor>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - The item type accepted by the plugin.

    public interface ScannerPlugin<I,D extends com.buschmais.jqassistant.core.store.api.model.Descriptor>
    Defines the interface for a scanner plugin.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ScannerPlugin.Requires
      Defines the annotation for specifying a dependency to another plugin to provide an instance of the given descriptor value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accepts(I item, String path, Scope scope)
      Determine if the item is accepted by the plugin.
      void configure(ScannerContext scannerContext, Map<String,Object> properties)
      Configure the plugin.

      Return the descriptor type produced by the plugin.

      Scan the item.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Initialize the plugin. Life cycle callback for a plugin to do static initialization. Will be exactly once after the plugin has been instantiated.

      • configure

        void configure(ScannerContext scannerContext,
               Map<String,Object> properties)
        Configure the plugin. This method is always called at least once after initialize() and allows re-configuring a plugin instance at runtime (e.g. in a Maven multi-module build process).
        Parameters:
        scannerContext - The scanner context.
        properties - The plugin properties.

      • getType

        Class<? extends I> getType()
        Return the item type accepted by the plugin.
        Returns:
        The item type.

      • getDescriptorType

        Class<? extends D> getDescriptorType()
        Return the descriptor type produced by the plugin.
        Returns:
        The descriptor type.

      • accepts

        boolean accepts(I item,
                String path,
                Scope scope)
         throws IOException
        Determine if the item is accepted by the plugin.
        Parameters:
        item - The item.
        path - The path where the item is located.
        scope - The scope.
        Returns:
        true if the plugin accepts the item.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a problem occurs.

      • scan

        D scan(I item,
       String path,
       Scope scope,
       Scanner scanner)
throws IOException
        Scan the item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item.
        path - The path where the item is located.
        scope - The scope.
        scanner - The scanner instance to delegate items this plugin resolves from the given item.
        Returns:
        The Descriptor instance representing the scanned item.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a problem occurs.
